resources.string: Automatic drive of the slideshow (progression through images) is available in the paid version
Unable to retrieve billing information. Please try again later. If the error continues, please drop me an email.
Unable to retrieve product information at this time. Please try again soon.
Access to this feature is available by subscription or in the paid version of the app on google play.

Access to this feature is available by subscription or in the paid version of the app on google play. NOTE: You will need to install the PiwigoClientWsExts plugin on your server. This is an essential requirement at this time as it adds missing functionality to your server.
I am not interested in paying money.

Many thousands of hours have been spent developing this app.

Adverts are irritating, and offer meaningful revenue only to Google.

Please consider either taking a subscription or installing the paid version of this app if you find it useful.

If you are genuinely not interested in making any payments (or wish to prevent this for some reason), continue and the option to do so will be removed from the menu. To reinstate this possibility, removal and reinstall of the app will likely be needed.
The purchases option has been removed from the app menu
